title: 2nd Childhood Sanitizer Holder Bag; Travel Size Empty 2 oz Refillable Bottle; Carabiner Clips on to Backpack or Purse
features: PERFECT SIZE: Convenient mini hand sanitizer holder gives you quick access to wash your hands and stay clean
CONVENIENT: Clip on keychain carabiner quickly secures to a belt loop, lanyard, backpack, purse, and luggage
EMPTY TRAVEL BOTTLE: Includes a reusable 2 oz empty hand sanitizer bottle; can be filled with liquids or lotions; TSA approved
DAILY ESSENTIALS - This palm-sized hand sanitizer holder was designed in Southern California and is built to last
INCLUDES: 1 portable hand sanitizer holder case, 1 attached carabiner clip and 1 empty reusable 2 ounce flip-cap bottle
description: This hand sanitizer holder is for those looking to keep their pockets empty while they cruise around. The bag quickly attaches to the belt loop on your pants and provides you with quick access to the bottle hanging from the slick carabiner. If you don't have a belt loop, this cute small multi-use bag can clip on to just about anything! Hook on to your suitcase when you're off on vacation or clip on your rear view mirror in your car. Going out to eat at the restaurant? Bring your new little bag! Heading out on a bike ride? Throw it on the handlebars!

The convenient cap to the bottle quickly spins off to allow for easy filling of hand sanitizer liquid from any large pump bottle at your home. This bag is great for a busy body, working men and women, caring moms, and those who are getting some exercise. Versatility is the game on your new little friend! You will find so many uses for this trendy little bag. Keep your eyes on your friends though because they are going to want to snatch this away from you.
A great stocking stuffer, birthday present, and gift for your friends and family. Guaranteed freshness on the accessories tip once again from 2nd Childhood!
